memberdef.name: DEFINE_COLOR_CONVERSION_BETWEEN_INT_AND_FLOATING_TYPES
memberdef.initializer: /*! \brief Color conversion between integral and floating point gray. */\ inline void convertColor(Float& dst, Int src) \ { \ Float M = static_cast<Float>(ColorTraits<Int>::max()); \ Float m = static_cast<Float>(ColorTraits<Int>::min()); \ dst = (static_cast<Float>(src)-m) / (M-m); \ } \ /*! \brief Color conversion between integral and floating point gray. */\ inline void convertColor(Int& dst, Float src) \ { \ src = Float(ColorTraits<Int>::min()) \ + src*( Float(ColorTraits<Int>::max()) \ - Float(ColorTraits<Int>::min()) ); \ dst = static_cast<Int>(src); \ }

briefdescription.para: Color conversion between integral and floating point gray colors.
